summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Pleasant Ridge Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue West and Queen Anne Avenue, from West Newell Street to West Armour Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13797 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
